channel.title: Help?
channel.description: i need help on how to make people admin on Project 16 plz help

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Hi,
Its easy. Go to your character folder and double click (or open it with a text pad) the user you want to make admin or mod. In the file you will see something like this:

[code]ACCOUNT]
character-username = admin
character-password = 117-2-20-157-29-204-86-227-94-2-104-89-15-243-204-224

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3253
character-posy = 3422
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070108
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 45218[/code]

There is more, but the only thing you need to edit, for the server to recognize you changing a users RIGHTS, is here. Go to the place where it says :character-rights = 1
and change the number 1(normal user) to 2 (mod user) or 3(admin user)
Hope thats what you wanted

Read full topic
